CustomField.description: The indicated product of the Applicable Product, based on the lookup to the Product object. When a Maintenance Plan is created using the Maintenance Plan Template, this product retrieves the Assets linked to the source record to create Maintenance Assets on the Plan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The indicated product of the Applicable Product, based on the lookup to the Product object. When a Maintenance Plan is created using the Maintenance Plan Template, this product retrieves the Assets linked to the source record to create Maintenance Assets on the Plan.
CustomField.label: Product
